co.edu.icesi.nextfruit.util

Class ColorConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • co.edu.icesi.nextfruit.util.ColorConverter

  • public class ColorConverter
extends java.lang.Object
    This static class converts color values from one color space to another.
    Author:
    JuanD

    • Method Detail

      • rgb2xyz

        public static double[] rgb2xyz(double[] rgb,
                               double[][] matrixM)
        Converts from RGB color space to equivalent XYZ color space. Color must be arranged in [R,G,B] order.
        Parameters:
        rgb, - array representing a color.
        matrixM, - the M matrix to use in the conversion.
        Returns:
        xyz, the xyz equivalent value of the rgb received as a parameter.

      • xyz2lab

        public static double[] xyz2lab(double[] xyz,
                               double whiteX,
                               double whiteY,
                               double whiteZ)
        Converts from XYZ color space to equivalent Lab color space. Color must be arranged in [X,Y,Z] order.
        Parameters:
        xyz, - array representing a color.
        illuminant, - string
        Returns:
        lab, Array with the Lab equivalent value of the xyz received as a parameter.

      • XYZ2xyY

        public static double[] XYZ2xyY(double[] XYZ,
                               double whiteX)
        Converts from XYZ color space to equivalent xyY color space.
        Parameters:
        XYZ, - array representing a color.
        Returns:
        xyY, Array with the xyY equivalent value of the XYZ received as a parameter.

      • rgb2xyY

        public static double[] rgb2xyY(int rgb,

      • bgr2rgb

        public static int bgr2rgb(double[] bgr)
        Groups bgr values into rgb integer
        Parameters:
        bgr: - color to be converted
        Returns:
        rgb as integer value

      • rgb2bgr

        public static double[] rgb2bgr(int rgb)
        Splits rgb integer into bgr values
        Parameters:
        rgb: - color to be converted
        Returns:
        bgr values

      • xyY2bgr

        public static double[] xyY2bgr(double[] xyY,
                               double[][] inverseM)
        Converts from xyY color space to equivalent RGB color space.
        Parameters:
        xyY, - array representing a color.
        inverseM, - the inverse M matrix to use in the conversion.
        Returns:
        RGB, Array with the RGB equivalent value of the XYZ received as a parameter. where: BGR[0] = blue component. BGR[1] = green component. BGR[2] = red component.

      • driveToComputerScale

        public static double[] driveToComputerScale(double[] bgr)

      • xyY2XYZ

        public static double[] xyY2XYZ(double[] xyY)
        Converts from xyY color space to equivalent XYZ color space.
        Parameters:
        xyY, - array representing a color.
        Returns:
        XYZ, Array with the XYZ equivalent value of the xyY received as a parameter.

      • xyz2bgr

        public static double[] xyz2bgr(double[] xyz,
                               double[][] inverseM)
        Converts from xyz color space to equivalent RGB color space.
        Parameters:
        xyz, - XYZ, array representing a color.
        inverseM, - the inverse M matrix to use in the conversion.
        Returns:
        RGB, Array with the RGB equivalent value of the XYZ received as a parameter. where: BGR[0] = blue component. BGR[1] = green component. BGR[2] = red component.
